metadata.Title: CVE-2017-6308 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in tnef before 1.4.13. Several Integer Overflows,which can lead to Heap Overflows, have been identified in the functionsthat wrap memory allocation.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-6308` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

tnef - 1.4.9-1+deb8u2build0.16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: tnef package in esm-apps/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.4.9-1+deb8u2build0.16.04.1').
